summary: Email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to attorney Brad Edwards, forwarding a court scheduling order related to a hearing on July 14th, 2020. The document shows communication between federal prosecutors and a defense attorney regarding case proceedings.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Recipient of an email from a federal prosecutor regarding a court scheduling order for a July 14th hearing.

persons.name: Alison
persons.context: Sender of the email, identified as an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, who forwarded a court scheduling order to Brad Edwards.

connections.description: Alison, a federal prosecutor, communicated with defense attorney Brad Edwards regarding a court scheduling order.

events.title: Scheduled Court Hearing
events.description: A court hearing was scheduled, as referenced in the email and the attached scheduling order.

keyFacts: The email shows communication between federal prosecutors and defense counsel in the Epstein case in July 2020.
A court hearing was scheduled for July 14, 2020, as indicated by the attached scheduling order.
The correspondence demonstrates ongoing legal proceedings in the Southern District of New York related to the Epstein case.
